function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of smart technology to track and trace infected individuals","Impact":"Potential invasion of privacy, public distrust, and reliance on data security","Mitigation":"Establishing clear guidelines, obtaining consent, transparency, and ensuring data security measures are in place","Technologies":"Smart solutions, spatio-temporal data collection, Bluetooth-based methods","People":"Infected individuals, general public","Owner":"Health authorities, government, technology developers"}]}
